system.special: SM Wep, Power Field, Unwieldy, Overheats
system.note:
Space Marines Only. Relic Master-Crafted Astartes Power Fist of the Deathwatch. Increases Unnatural Strength x2 to x3 as normal for Power Fists.
Can't be dropped if it overheats.
